translations: 解开；取消（undo 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: That one mistake was his undoing.
His lack of experience may prove to be his undoing.
sentences.translation: 缺乏经验可能就是他失败的原因。

sentences.sentence: By stopping smoking you are undoing most of the damage smoking has caused.
sentences.translation: 通过戒烟，你就是在消除吸烟所致的大多数危害。
